content.webTitle: From detachable collars to Emily In Paris: this week’s fashion trends

fields.headline: From detachable collars to Emily In Paris: this week’s fashion trends
fields.bodyText: Going up Jin Ha’s hair Breakout star of BBC One’s Love Life, a rare TV romcom that has rom and com. Swoonsome. Assistants From Nick Newbold (Marc Jacobs’s in his quarantine film) to P Diddy’s legendary Fonzworth Bentley, they are the wind beneath stars’ wings. Detachable collars See: Asos, Etsy and the Vampire’s Wife x H&M. Show me a more Zoom-worthy accessory. Virtual makeovers Pretend your art skills have improved and transform into Frida Kahlo with Google’s Arts & Culture app. Swedish candles Ikea has just announced a candle collaboration with Byredo. Sadly it doesn’t smell of a Billy bookcase. Going down Crocs McDonald’s is the new fashion collaborator of choice, as seen in their stylist team-ups with J Balvin and Travis Scott. Emily In Paris Irina Shayk channels Regina George in her cut-out top, showing up why Mean Girls is our perennial style compass. 00s revival Musically now, it’s all about “bubblegrunge”. Listen to the debut album from Beabadoobee for evidence. Hands Forget DIY; the Theragun handheld massager is just what your WFH posture needs. Throwaway tampon applicators Dame are coming out with the first ever reusable applicator.
